column5: YAY, pick up the new suit in day or 2... can't wait to try it on.. http://www.mustangsurvival.com/recreational/integrity-hx-flotation-suit?division=recreation Thinking im gonna test out the old canadian tire one i have now, see what its like to go thru in the beach and how easy it is to climb out. the wife is gonna man the camera and i'll have my brother with the throw rope. its only 3 or 4 feet deep so it will be fun lol
Make sure you  take the batteries out of the electric undies before you go in. Gongrats on the new suit.
